resources.string:
If you're seeing this screen, you've either:
* Started this app directly
* Shared something other than an image
* The share is formed as */* instead of image/*

Try sharing images from Google Photos.

Note: If files are still streaming as a result of downloading from Google Photos, they may fail to appear in Google Lens on the first attempt. Simply wait a moment and retry. This issue and some of the others listed above will be fixed in an update.
